com.github.restdriver.clientdriver
Class DefaultRequestMatcher

java.lang.Object
  com.github.restdriver.clientdriver.DefaultRequestMatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequestMatcher
public final class DefaultRequestMatcher
extends Object
implements RequestMatcher

Implementation of RequestMatcher. This implementation expects exact match in terms of the HTTP method, the path & query string, and any body of the request.

Method Detail

isMatch

public boolean isMatch(RealRequest realRequest,
                       ClientDriverRequest expectedRequest)
Description copied from interface: RequestMatcher
Checks for a match between a real RealRequest and an expected ClientDriverRequest. This implementation is as strict as it can be with exact matching for Strings, but can also use regular expressions in the form of Patterns.

Specified by:
isMatch in interface RequestMatcher
Parameters:
realRequest - The real request RealRequest
expectedRequest - The expected ClientDriverRequest
Returns:
True if there is a match, falsetto otherwise.
